original_title: La inviolabilidad del domicilio se basa en el hombre que aparece empu√±ando un hacha en la puerta de su casa
overview: In the garden of a provincial summer house, a series of operations is carried out, involving a man, a woman and a group of individuals with certain convictions.
title: The Inviolability of the Domicile Is Based on the Man Who Appears Wielding an Axe at the Door of His House
